attributes.action: ss taking kids off innocent parents
attributes.additional_details: we want 2 children giving back 2 there loving parents u cant take a disabled little girl 2 into care 4 no reason the mother looked after her 24/7 the mother took little boy to docs and sent them 2 hospital in docs opinion the marks he had looked like nip or pinch marks we dont know what they are but certainly no one has harmed him in any way all community nurses, health visitors know these parents and know how fantastic they are with there children the little girl is being passed from foster carers 2 other foster carers around the region ending up in hos as no one can cope with her needs apart from the parents we want them back soon as.
